plot: We all heard the proverb "First impression is the best impression". And Munnariyippu explains the foolishness of such a first impressions. A clear case of fictional proof that "A person can never be judged with his behavior".
title: Munnariyippu
plot_es: We all heard the proverb "First impression is the best impression". And Munnariyippu explains the foolishness of such a first impressions. A clear case of fictional proof that "A person can never be judged with his behavior".
